title: Rajasi Bangle: Ruby and Diamond Floral Vaanki
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a square-cut Ruby of approximately 2 carats and brilliant-cut Diamonds totaling approximately 1.5 carats. Diamonds are of VS clarity and G-H color.
features: This meticulously crafted vaanki features an intricate, floral-inspired openwork design. The central focus is a vibrant square-cut ruby, framed by a halo of sparkling diamonds in a pave setting. The gold framework exhibits delicate filigree details, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship unique to Hyderabadi jewelry. The openwork allows light to enhance the brilliance of the gemstones.
colors: The primary color scheme is a rich
warm yellow gold contrasted by the deep
passionate red of the ruby and the dazzling white of the diamonds. This creates a captivating visual balance
reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry color palettes.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (pellillu)
or significant cultural events. Also suitable as a striking statement piece for upscale parties and gatherings.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and modern elegance. This vaanki is handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, known for their exceptional jewelry-making techniques. The high-quality ruby symbolizes love and passion, while the diamonds signify purity and commitment. This piece is not just jewelry, but a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and a rich, luxurious feel.
